name: chat-frontend
description: Chat em tempo real - Frontend React

scripts.test:connectivity: echo '🧪 Testando conectividade...' && curl -f http://localhost:3000 || echo '❌ Frontend offline'
scripts.test:full: echo '🧪 TESTE COMPLETO DO FRONTEND' && yarn test:connectivity && yarn test && echo '✅ Frontend OK'
scripts.test:performance: echo '🧪 Teste de performance...' && time curl -s http://localhost:3000 > /dev/null
